GSD.description:
dmaengine: zynqmp_dma: In struct zynqmp_dma_chan fix desc_size data type

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 83960276ffc9bf5570d4106490346b61e61be5f3. For more details please see the references link.
